subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams fell to Flavia Pennetta in the Bangkok Open semifinals, losing three set points in a 6-4, 7-6 (8) defeat. Pennetta will face Chan Yung-jan in the final. She beat Yan Zi, 7-5, 3-6, 7-5.
snippet: Venus Williams fell to Flavia Pennetta in the Bangkok Open semifinals, losing three set points in a 6-4, 7-6 (8) defeat. Pennetta will face Chan Yung-jan in the final. She beat Yan Zi, 7-5, 3-6, 7-5.
